content:
TERM: Example Format

DEFINITION:
Example Format: taking a large step towards your growth

BLUEPRINT DETAILS:
SPR extracted from agi.txt Node ?, type: capitalized_concept. Original SPR name: 'Example Format'

EXAMPLE APPLICATION:
 you are taking a large step towards your growth. 
Vetting: Verification of the step using credible sources, including URLs and links to relevant information.
URLs and Links: Inclusion of URLs and links to support the vetting process, allowing users to verify the reasoning and accuracy of the plan.
Example Format

->|step|<-
->|thinking|<- [Insert thinking and analysis of the step] ->|/thinking|<-
->|reflection|<- [Insert reflection and analysis of the step, considering alternative approaches an
